00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : VGrid
00003 ! Revision   : 1.1 (2008-11-10)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00037 
00038  SUBROUTINE VGrid
00039 
00040 ! Common variables
00041  USE Domain
00042  USE MPIParams
00043  USE MPI
00044  IMPLICIT NONE
00045 
00046 ! Local variables
00047  INTEGER :: complete, direction, partial, shift
00048  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, xeast, xwest, ynorth, ysouth
00049  INTEGER, DIMENSION(1:mpi_dim) :: dims, mpi_coords
00050  LOGICAL, DIMENSION(1:mpi_dim) :: periodic
00051  LOGICAL :: reorder
00052 
00053 
00054 ! Initialize data for domain partitioning. Defaults are:
00055 ! Partitioning is periodic in all dimensions (periodic = .true.)
00056 ! CPUs are reordered in the grid for proximity (reorder = .true.)
00057  dims(1)     = mpi_xdim
00058  dims(2)     = mpi_ydim
00059  periodic(1) = .true.
00060  periodic(2) = .true.
00061  reorder     = .true.
00062 
00063 ! Create the new virtual connectivity grid
00064  CALL MPI_CART_CREATE(MPI_COMM_WORLD, mpi_dim, dims, periodic, reorder, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00065 
00066 ! Get this processor ID within the virtual grid
00067  CALL MPI_COMM_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc, MPI_ERR)
00068  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00069 
00070 !-------- Compute the limits [(xl,xu),(yl,yu)] assigned to this processor ------
00071 ! Partitioning in the x direction
00072  complete = (xmax - xmin) / dims(1)
00073  partial  = (xmax - xmin) - complete*dims(1)
00074  IF(mpi_coords(1) + 1 <= partial) THEN
00075    xl = xmin + (complete + 1)*mpi_coords(1)
00076    xu = xmin + (complete + 1)*(mpi_coords(1) + 1) - 1
00077  ELSE
00078    xl = xmin + complete*mpi_coords(1) + partial
00079    xu = xmin + complete*(mpi_coords(1) + 1) + partial - 1
00080  END IF
00081  IF(MOD(mpi_coords(1) + 1,dims(1)) == 0) xu = xu + 1
00082 ! Partitioning in the y direction
00083  complete = (ymax - ymin) / dims(2)
00084  partial  = (ymax - ymin) - complete*dims(2)
00085  IF(mpi_coords(2) + 1 <= partial) THEN
00086    yl = ymin + (complete + 1)*mpi_coords(2)
00087    yu = ymin + (complete + 1)*(mpi_coords(2) + 1) - 1
00088  ELSE
00089    yl = ymin + complete*mpi_coords(2) + partial
00090    yu = ymin + complete*(mpi_coords(2) + 1) + partial - 1
00091  END IF
00092  IF(MOD(mpi_coords(2) + 1,dims(2)) == 0) yu = yu + 1
00093 
00094 ! Assign ghost layers to momentum mesh
00095  xlg = xl - 1
00096  xug = xu + 1
00097  ylg = yl - 1
00098  yug = yu + 1
00099 
00100 ! Set computational domain limits for order parameter mesh
00101  xmin_f = xmin
00102  ymin_f = ymin
00103  xmax_f = 2*xmax - 1
00104  ymax_f = 2*ymax - 1
00105 
00106 ! Limits of order parameter mesh in this processor
00107  xl_f = 2*xl - 2
00108  xu_f = 2*xu - 1
00109  yl_f = 2*yl - 2
00110  yu_f = 2*yu - 1
00111 
00112 ! Assign ghost layers to order parameter mesh
00113  xlg_f = xl_f - 1
00114  xug_f = xu_f + 1
00115  ylg_f = yl_f - 1
00116  yug_f = yu_f + 1
00117 
00118 !-------- Determine neighbours of this processor -------------------------------
00119 ! MPI_CART counts dimensions using 0-based arithmetic so that
00120 ! direction = 0 -> x  |  direction = 1 -> y
00121 ! Ranks of neighbours of this processor in the x and y directions
00122  shift     = 1
00123  direction = 0
00124  CALL MPI_CART_SHIFT(MPI_COMM_VGRID, direction, shift, west, east, MPI_ERR)
00125  direction = 1
00126  CALL MPI_CART_SHIFT(MPI_COMM_VGRID, direction, shift, south, north, MPI_ERR)
00127 
00128 ! Coordinates of neighbours of this processor in the x and y directions
00129  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, east, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00130  xeast = mpi_coords(1)
00131 
00132  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, west, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00133  xwest = mpi_coords(1)
00134 
00135  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, north, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00136  ynorth = mpi_coords(2)
00137 
00138  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, south, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00139  ysouth = mpi_coords(2)
00140 
00141 ! Ranks of the diagonal neighbours of this processor
00142  mpi_coords(1) = xeast
00143  mpi_coords(2) = ynorth
00144  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,ne,MPI_ERR)
00145 
00146  mpi_coords(1) = xwest
00147  mpi_coords(2) = ysouth
00148  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,sw,MPI_ERR)
00149 
00150  mpi_coords(1) = xwest
00151  mpi_coords(2) = ynorth
00152  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,nw,MPI_ERR)
00153 
00154  mpi_coords(1) = xeast
00155  mpi_coords(2) = ysouth
00156  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,se,MPI_ERR)
00157 
00158  RETURN
00159  END SUBROUTINE VGrid
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:56 2008 for ZSC-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
